qas.question: Where was the oldest brain that was found?
How old was the oldest brain discovered thought to be?
The oldest known brain discovered was found in how old of a person?
The oldest brain found in a cave was from what gender of human?

context: The oldest brain to have been discovered was in <a0_0>Armenia<a0_0/> in the Areni-1 cave complex. The brain, estimated to be <a1_0>over 5,000 years old<a1_0/>, was found in the skull of a <a2_0>12 to 14-year-old<a2_0/> <a3_0>girl<a3_0/>. Although the brains were shriveled, they were well preserved due to the climate found inside the cave.
